page.title: 04STOKEHAM VILLAGE
page.content: I have just moved into Stokeham from Derbyshire.It is very small and the houses are built around the village centre. There are several farms and about twenty houses. The village church is very small. The people are nice and frfiendly. We go to Rampton School by mini-bus, and when I leave to go to secondary school I will have to travel by bus into Retford.Stokeham has no shops. The nearest shop is in Rampton or in Woodbeck. I like it here because it is quiet and I enjoy being on my own.
